overwatch.db

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • overwatch.db.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides basic global database functions.
    Version:
    4
    Author:
    Lee Coakley

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static void connect()
        Start making connections to the database. For the moment, this is automatic and doesn't need to be used.

      • disconnect

        public static void disconnect()
        Disconnect from the database. Closes all connections and cleans up resources.

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Get a database connection from the pool. Return it when finished!
        Returns:
        Connection
        See Also:
        ConnectionPool

      • queryKeyNamePairs

        public static <T> java.util.ArrayList<NameRefPair<T>> queryKeyNamePairs(java.lang.String table,
                                                        java.lang.String keyColumn,
                                                        java.lang.String nameColumn,
                                                        java.lang.Class<? extends T[]> keyType)
        Get an ArrayList of NameRefPairs from a table, based on two columns. Intended for use with the GUI's SearchPanel functions.
        Parameters:
        table - Table to query.
        keyColumn - Name of column to key on (e.g. personNo)
        nameColumn - Name of column with associated names. Must be a varchar/char type column.
        keyType - Type of key. Usually Integer[].
        Returns:
        ArrayList>

      • queryKeyNamePairsOrdered

        public static <T> java.util.ArrayList<NameRefPair<T>> queryKeyNamePairsOrdered(java.lang.String table,
                                                               java.lang.String keyColumn,
                                                               java.lang.String nameColumn,
                                                               java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                               java.lang.Class<? extends T[]> keyType)
        Get an ArrayList of NameRefPairs from a table, based on two columns. Intended for use with the GUI's SearchPanel functions.
        Parameters:
        table - Table to query.
        keyColumn - Name of column to key on (e.g. personNo)
        nameColumn - Name of column with associated names. Must be a varchar/char type column.
        keyType - Type of key. Usually Integer[].
        orderBy - SQL for orderBy clause. A comma-separated list of columns from the table, optionally with "desc" keyword.
        Returns:
        ArrayList>

      • queryKeyNamePairsGeneral

        public static <T> java.util.ArrayList<NameRefPair<T>> queryKeyNamePairsGeneral(java.lang.String query,
                                                               java.lang.String keyColumn,
                                                               java.lang.String nameColumn,
                                                               java.lang.Class<? extends T[]> keyType)
        Get an ArrayList of NameRefPairs from a table. Intended for use with the GUI's SearchPanel functions.
        Parameters:
        query - Query to run
        keyColumn - Name of column to key on (e.g. personNo)
        nameColumn - Name of column with associated names. Must be a varchar/char type column.
        keyType - Type of key. Usually Integer[].
        orderBy - SQL for orderBy clause. A comma-separated list of columns from the table, optionally with "desc" keyword.
        Returns:
        ArrayList>

      • lock

        public static void lock(java.sql.Connection conn,
        java.lang.String... tables)
        Prevent read/write access from being made to tables. They're queued until it's unlocked again. Make damn sure to unlock() after!
        Parameters:
        conn -
        tables -

      • unlock

        public static void unlock(java.sql.Connection conn)
        Unlock all locked tables for the given session.
